table.name: civicrm_appearancemodifier_petition
table.comment: This table contains the settings for the modified petitions.

field.name: background_color
field.comment: The color code of the background in #ffffff format.

field.name: additional_note
field.comment: The text that will be displayed after the submit button on the edit form.

field.name: petition_message
field.comment: The text that will be displayed in the petition message input.

field.name: invert_consent_fields
field.comment: This field triggers the invert behaviour of the consent checkboxes.

field.name: target_number_of_signers
field.comment: The target number of the petition signers.

field.name: custom_social_box
field.comment: This field triggers the custom social sharing layout.

field.name: external_share_url
field.comment: This link will be shared in the custom social box.

field.name: add_placeholder
field.comment: Set the text input label as placeholder text in the input.

field.name: hide_form_labels
field.comment: Hide the form labels and use only the placeholders.

field.name: font_color
field.comment: The color code of the fonts in #ffffff format.

field.name: signers_block_position
field.comment: The position where the number of petition signers is displayed.

field.name: consent_field_behaviour
field.comment: This field describes the behaviour of the consent logic.
